title: The Shopkeeper's Journal
description: Thursday-Few things can rouse people like a good story. Even better is the wonder and intrigue of a legend, the inevitable stares of those hearing the tale as their imaginations race through the possibilities and what-ifs.He's never named, yet his wisdom, instincts, and gifts are unerring.He is the Shopkeeper.Â This is his journal, full of trials and celebrations big and small...and the all-too-human cast of characters to whom they happen.
author: Troy Rasmussen
